name: OpenELEC RPi Config
tagline: Unofficial Raspberry Pi configuration add-on for OpenELEC
body:
![icon.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/18055122/repo/script.openelec.rpi.config/icon.png)

## Installation
=============================

1. Install my XBMC repository from [xbmc.repo.leopold.zip](http://bit.ly/1gorQQG).
1. Install **OpenELEC RPi Config** from **Leopold's Add-ons** under **Services**.

## Screenshots
=============================

![Custom overclocking screenshot](http://ls80.github.io/script.openelec.rpi.config/screenshots/screenshot000.png "Custom overclocking settings")

## Usage
=============================

Currently only a subset of all possible properties can be configured. The complete list is shown below.

#### Overclocking
* arm_freq
* core_freq
* sdram_freq
* over_voltage
* over_voltage_sdram
* force_turbo
* initial_turbo

#### Video
* gpu_mem
* hdmi_force_hotplug
* hdmi_drive
* hdmi_force_edid_audio
* hdmi_pixel_encoding
* sdtv_mode
* sdtv_aspect
* disable_overscan
* overscan_scale
* overscan_left
* overscan_right
* overscan_top
* overscan_bottom

#### Misc
* decode_MPG2
* decode_WVC1
* hdmi_ignore_cec
* disable_splash

For more information see http://elinux.org/RPiconfig.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
